long_description: Built with sandal footbeds and canvas uppers and featuring playful doodles, the Sanuk Scribble Shoes are perfect for a casual, fun outing around town with friends. Loose-fitting uppers allow feet to move and spread for natural shock absorption and stability. EVA midsoles offer ample cushioning and a stable platform to walk on; soft EVA footbeds feature AEGIS(R) antimicrobial additive to help deter odors. All-synthetic construction makes these vegan-friendly. Closeout.
short_description: Built with sandal footbeds and canvas uppers and featuring playful doodles, the Sanuk Scribble Shoes are perfect for a casual, fun outing around town with friends.
